basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Harsh Porwal, a self taught developer, I come from finance background, turned into programming after some exploration, Currently I am working at a startup as a Front Engineer for both Mobile and Web. I am good with JavaScript, Currently I have worked on MERN stack and React Native, also familiar with basics of TypeScript and testing, Apart from coding I read Books,As of now Exploring things and focusing on becoming a better developer

projects.title: Fin-Store
projects.description: FinStore is an full-stack e-commerce application, Which has features from User management to placing an aorder and making payment for your order, The tech stack used is MERN and razorpay for payment gateway

projects.title: Fine-Socials
projects.description: Fine-Socials is a full-stack social media platform, Which has featuers like User management, Create post, Edit Post, Delete Post, Comment on someone's post, Like/Unlike post, Follow/unfollow users etc, The tech stack used is MERN stack.

projects.title: Quiz App
projects.description: This is a Quiz application which has feati=ures like, User management, play quiz, stores all records of quiz played with scores, leaderboards, after quiz analysis, The tech stack used is MERN plus TypeScript :)

projects.title: Fin-Tube
projects.description: Fin-Tube is my basioc version of youtube, which has features like User management, Playlist management, History feature, Like/dislike video. The tech stack used is MERN

projects.title: Even Ui
projects.description: Even-UI is a css component library, Which has wide range of small components which can be used to create awesome projects, I have used it's components in my other projects and made it to get a gist of design system thing, It is purely created with HTML and CSS .

projects.title: Blogs
projects.description: I have written few blogs, It helps me grasp the concept a little better .
